tasks.instruction: Create a PRD for the TimeTable Generator web application, including user stories, requirements analysis, and feature specifications. Save the PRD at '/data/chats/uloe2/workspace/docs/timetable_generator_prd.json'

Design the system architecture for the TimeTable Generator, including database schema, API design, and component design. Include the genetic algorithm design for timetable generation. Save the design document at '/data/chats/uloe2/workspace/docs/timetable_generator_design.json'

Implement the TimeTable Generator web application using Python (Streamlit for web interface and dashboard), following the system design. The implementation should include all specified features: role-based access, genetic algorithm for timetable generation, PDF export, and data persistence. Save the code at '/data/chats/uloe2/workspace/src/'
